item.title: Jim add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "He who controls the past controls the future. He who controls the present controls the past." -- George Orwell

item.title: Jim add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "Perhaps a lunatic was simply a minority of one." -- George Orwell

item.title: Jim add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Jim add a quote by Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy
item.description: "We are the music makers, and we are the dreamers of dreams." -- Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy

item.title: Jim add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Jim add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "For instance, on the planet Earth, man had always assumed that he was more intelligent than dolphins because he had achieved so much&mdash;the wheel, New York, wars and so on&mdash;whilst all the dolphins had ever done was muck about in the water having a good time. But conversely, the dolphins had always believed that they were far more intelligent than man&mdash;for precisely the same reasons." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Jim add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The Guide says there is an art to flying", said Ford, "or rather a knack. The knack lies in learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Jim add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "Ford... you're turning into a penguin. Stop it." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Jim add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You buy furniture. You tell yourself, this is the last sofa I will ever need in my life. Buy the sofa, then for a couple years you're satisfied that no matter what goes wrong, at least you've got your sofa issue handled. Then the right set of dishes. Then the perfect bed. The drapes. The rug. Then you're trapped in your lovely nest, and the things you used to own, now they own you." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Jim add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "I am Jack's complete lack of surprise. I am Jack's Broken Heart." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Jim add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Sometimes people are beautiful. Not in looks. Not in what they say. Just in what they are." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Jim add a quote by Daphne du Maurier
Jim add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Jim add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde
